The post was published on Facebook by a: based user on August 26, 2020, and has been shared more than 380 times.
The images featured in the post include: 3. The caption underneath the images claims that bumblebees do not fly, but rather use "acoustic levitation" due to a resonance matching the Earth's magnetic field.
Biologists at Arizona State University: ASU) have refuted the claim, stating that bees can fly because their wings generate enough lift through quick sweeping motions, not because of "acoustic levitation."
